MasterTable.Name: Bands
MasterTable.AddCommand: INSERT INTO Bands (BandName, BandGenre, BandTheme) VALUES (@BandName, @Genre, @Theme)
MasterTable.UpdateCommand: UPDATE Bands SET BandName = @BandName, BandGenre = @Genre, BandTheme = @Theme WHERE BandId = @BandId

DetailTable.Name: Members
DetailTable.AddCommand: INSERT INTO Members (BandId, MemberName, MemberInstrument) VALUES (@BandId, @MemberName, @Instrument)
DetailTable.UpdateCommand: UPDATE Members SET MemberName = @MemberName, MemberInstrument = @Instrument WHERE MemberId = @MemberId
